name: Ice Idol Challenge
description:
A game where you play as Cirno and has to defeat a familiar enemy!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement and dodging, multiple arrow keys move in diagonal!

Up - Attack

Mouse Click - Skip Dialogues and Start the Game

Credits:

Godot Engine and their Dodge The Creeps Assets

BebeYoshi - Programming and writing

Nyutamoto Twitter - Sprites and Background
